data.comment: The big names in today's match at Bosuilstadion have now been confirmed.
The match has started at Bosuilstadion.
In the minute 35, Knowledge Musona for Eupen has been booked by Bram Van Driessche and receives a first yellow card.
Penalty! Bram Van Driessche points to the spot, great chance for Eupen...
In the minute 45, The first half has been concluded at Bosuilstadion.
Goal! Smail Prevljak gives Eupen the lead from the penalty spot. The score is now 0-1.
In the minute 45, Antwerp's Ritchie De Laet has been booked in Antwerp.
Mamadou Kone (Eupen) gets a yellow card.
At Bosuilstadion, Dieumerci Mbokani has been yellow-carded for the home team.
The second half has started at Bosuilstadion.
The home team replace Nill De Pauw with Manuel Benson.
In the minute 53, Great finish from Knowledge Musona to give Eupen a 0-2 lead.
Great play from Smail Prevljak to set up the goal.
Bruny Nsimba is replacing Martin Hongla for the home team.
In the minute 62, Junior Pius (Antwerp) heads in to reduce the deficit. The score is now 1-2.
Abdoulaye Seck with an assist there.
Edo Kayembe is replacing Knowledge Musona for Eupen at Bosuilstadion.
In the minute 65, Smail Prevljak (Eupen) has received a yellow card from Bram Van Driessche.
Jordi Amat (Eupen) has received a first yellow card.
Benat San Jose Gil is making the team's second substitution at Bosuilstadion with Andreas Beck replacing Adriano.
In the minute 77, Junior Pius (Antwerp) levels the match at 2-2 with a header.
Dieumerci Mbokani instrumental with a fine assist.
Koji Miyoshi is on a sub for Lior Refaelov for Antwerp.
In the minute 83, Benat San Jose Gil (Eupen) is making a third substitution, with Julien Ngoy replacing Smail Prevljak.
Julien Ngoy for Eupen has been booked by Bram Van Driessche and receives a first yellow card.
Benoit Poulain is booked for the away team.
The whistle has gone to end the second half. The match finishes 2-2.
